Article Name: AI Startup Flock Thinks It Can Eliminate All Crime In America
Description: With more than 80,000 AI-powered cameras across the U.S., Flock Safety has become one of cops’ go-to surveillance tools. Now CEO Garrett Langley has both police tech giant Axon and Chinese drone maker DJI in his sights on the way to his goal: Preventing all crime in the U.S.

Article Name: AI’s Next Job? Recruiting People To Train More AI
Description: Mercor, debuting on the Forbes Cloud 100 list, built an AI recruiter to interview job candidates. Then it discovered a cash cow: finding humans to train AI models.

Article Name: How An AI Notetaker Became One Of The Few Profitable AI Startups
Description: Nathan Xu’s Plaud has sold more than 1 million AI recording devices that transcribe and summarize the busy days of doctors, lawyers and business people.

Article Name: This Startup Is Racing To Be The First To Mine Helium On The Moon
Description: Interlune is developing robots to harvest a valuable gas on the lunar surface that could have a big impact on Earth.

Article Name: Chicago’s Hot Dog King Dick Portillo On Selling Out And Moving On
Description: Dick Portillo built his hot dog chain Portillo's over 50 years and sold it for nearly $1 billion in 2014. Then he retired and assembled a new restaurant and real estate empire.

Article Name: The Top 10 Richest People In The World | September 2025
Description: Google cofounders are the past month's biggest gainers while the world's richest person Elon Musk widens the gap between him and everyone else.

Article Name: How Protein-Packed Junk Food Could Make America Fit Again
Description: Legendary Foods CEO Ron Penna sold his first protein bar company, Quest Nutrition, for $1 billion. His newest flex is selling fitness freaks ‘healthy’ versions of cinnamon rolls, donuts, and mac and cheese—and now brings in $180 million in revenue.

Article Name: Happy Birthday, Warren Buffett! He’s 95 And One Of 36 American Billionaires Over 90
Description: America’s billionaires are older than ever, with one in five already in their 80s or 90s. That doesn’t mean they are necessarily slowing down.

Article Name: College Football Teams, Desperate For Cash To Pay Players, Are Rushing To Add Premium Seats
Description: An NCAA settlement introducing revenue sharing is set to strain school budgets. The most obvious solution: pass the cost on to the most loyal and deep-pocketed fans.

Article Name: Forbes Travel Guide’s Most Anticipated Hotel Openings For Fall 2025
Description: From Lake Como to Los Cabos, these 11 new properties offer every amenity under the sun—from a floating pool to a private ski lodge

Article Name: Charles Ergen’s Net Worth Doubles After Controversial AT&T Sale
Description: Charles Ergen's wealth jumped after announcing plans to unload some of EchoStar's spectrum for $23 billion. The move killed any dreams of his nationwide 5G network.
Forbes' 2025 list of NFL team valuations features a new record by the No. 1 Dallas Cowboys. See the full ranking of all 32 franchises—each worth at least $5 billion.

Article Name: Here’s Why Old Homes Suddenly Cost More Than New Ones
Description: Old homes cost more than new ones in 2025. June data: existing homes at $441,500, new homes at $401,800. Why the switch? Check the numbers under the surface.

Article Name: Trump’s Tariff Tidal Wave Could Drown This Coconut Water Juggernaut
Description: When it comes to selling coconut water to the health obsessed, New York’s Vita Coco has served up a master class, schooling even giant rivals like Coke and Pepsi. Its next test will be withstanding Trump’s tariff shocks.

Article Name: Here’s How Much Taylor Swift And Travis Kelce Are Worth
Description: The billionaire pop star and three-time Super Bowl champion are engaged, but no “gym teacher” could afford to propose to an “English teacher” with a $650,000 diamond ring.
